communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Lecture tone; pseudo-scientific framing; frame women as objects with market value.

narratives.c_essay: The dating market is a zero-sum game where men are the primary competitors. Women are the prizes to be won, and their value is determined by their physical attractiveness and fertility. Men must develop themselves to become high-value, or they will be left behind.
narratives.p_intro: Welcome to the harsh reality of the dating world, where only the strongest survive. I'm here to guide you through the labyrinth of female psychology and help you unlock your true potential as a high-value male.
